description:
During those high intensity workouts or long hikes, you’ll want something that breathes and wicks moisture. The essential boxer is your all-day companion with its soft and chafe free design, to make any challenge possible.

  • 95% TENCEL™ lyocell/5% spandex stretch jersey fabric to keep you comfy all day
  • A contoured pouch and full fly provide stability and easy access
  • Ergonomic design and anti-roll waistband keep it locked in place
name: Patagonia Essential Boxer Briefs 6" - Men's
